# Alan Jackson Lifetime Achievement Award

The Alan Jackson Lifetime Achievement Award, instituted in 2025 during the 60th ACM Awards, is given by the Academy of Country Music. The award will be awarded to, "an iconic artist, duo, or group that has achieved both national and international prominence and stature through concert performances, philanthropy, record sales, streaming numbers, and public representation", according to a press release detailing the award. Also stating that artists who will receive the award will have "positively impacted and contributed to the genre's growth over the years" as well as achieved "an unprecedented historical impact on fans and industry nationally and internationally."
The award will be chosen by the Academy of Country Music's special awards committee.
